backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing dating profiles, matching, chat, signaling, and access control with in-memory Map stores and authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old Nat‑keyed match/chat/signaling maps into new ChatId‑keyed structures while carrying over existing profile and like data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend project files describing their roles, routing, UI components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry document with PWA metadata, icons, manifest link, and scripts to load the pre-boot loader and React app.
frontend/public/entry-loader.js: Pre‑boot script disabling service workers, clearing caches, blocking future registrations, and providing a startup watchdog and global error handler.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, start URL, theming, and display properties for installation.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styled message, Nepali translation, and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that disables caching, deletes all caches, and unregisters itself for debugging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, auth state, online status, profile checks, and various modal flows.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation menu, language toggle, and page structure.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches fatal React errors and shows a reload prompt with optional error details.
frontend/src/components/ItsAMatchModal.t: Modal shown when two users match, displaying avatars and offering to start a chat or continue swiping.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Dropdown button to switch between English and Nepali using the i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/OfflineState.tsx: Simple component displaying an offline alert using translated text.
frontend/src/components/PhoneNumberPromp: Modal prompting users to optionally add a phone number, with save and skip actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, matches, messaging, and signaling using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoCall.ts: Implements WebRTC video call flow with signaling, media stream handling, and connection state management.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state and translation lookup via React context.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains English translation strings for UI labels, messages, and prompts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes plus global UI rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Chat UI that loads messages, sends new ones, and manages video call states using hooks and computed chat IDs.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays swipe-style profile browsing with like/pass actions and temporary feedback animations.
frontend/src/pages/InstallHelp.tsx: Provides installation instructions for Android and iOS using accordions and static guidance text.
frontend/src/pages/Matches.tsx: Shows a grid of matched profiles and lets users open a chat by selecting a match.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile editor form that loads user data, manages field inputs, and saves updates to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page for language control, phone number display, account info, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Renders the app’s welcome screen with feature cards and a login button using Internet Identity and i18n.
frontend/src/utils/chatId.ts: Computes a deterministic ChatId object by sorting two principals for consistent pairing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current feature set and requirements, focusing on UI fixes, swipe functionality, matching flow, and styling updates.
